thread.title: Re: 5 middle school students face charges for throwing piece of a 2X4 at Trump motorcade
thread.title_full: Re: 5 middle school students face charges for throwing piece of a 2X4 at Trump motorcade

author: John Galt
title: Re: 5 middle school students face charges for throwing piece of a 2X4 at Trump motorcade
text:
— Ian McLaren (@iancmclaren) February 19, 2017 
Just to follow up on that story we told you about on Friday night regarding an object that was thrown at President Trump’s motorcade as it headed from the airport in Palm Beach, Fla. to his Mar-a-Lago club, the perpetrators have been identified: AP: Authorities say a vehicle in President Donald Trump's motorcade was struck by a "2×4" and five middle school students now face charges. 
— FOX 13 Tampa Bay (@FOX13News) February 19, 2017 
According to the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office , one of the middle school students admitted throwing the piece of wood and then ratted out his 4 friends: Trending
